daily_summary.headline: Exciting Space Events and Aurora Opportunities

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: A potential G1 geomagnetic storm on February 8, 2026, with a Kp index of 4.67, offers a chance for aurora sightings at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check visibility conditions in northern regions.

top_events.title: Long March 2F/G Launch
top_events.description: Launch of the Chinese Reusable Space Vehicle, a top-secret mission, scheduled for February 7, 2026.

top_events.title: SpaceX Starlink Launch
top_events.description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 Block 5 will launch Starlink Group 17-33 on February 7, 2026, contributing to the global internet constellation.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65째+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
